auth.adminLoginSubtitle: Sign in to manage projects and enrollments
auth.studentEnrollmentSubtitle: Enter your enrollment token to access your projects

project.title: Projects
project.name: Project Name
project.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this project?

course.title: Courses
course.name: Course Name
course.capacityHint: Maximum number of students (leave empty for unlimited)
course.occurrenceRequired: At least one occurrence is required
course.calendarHint: Click on a time slot to create a new course. Click on existing courses to edit.
course.noSectionsHint: Please create time sections first in the Time Sections tab.
course.noTagsHint: No tags defined. Create tags in the Tags tab first.

student.title: Students
student.identifiersDescription: Enter student emails, IDs, or any identifiers (one per line). Tokens will be automatically generated for each student.
student.enrollmentDescription: Students enrolled in this project can access their enrollment page using their unique token.
student.tokenNote: Replace STUDENT_TOKEN_HERE with actual student token
student.deleteAllConfirm: Delete all students? This cannot be undone.

timeSection.title: Time Sections
timeSection.name: Section Name
timeSection.label: Label
timeSection.description: Define time sections for your schedule. These will be used as rows in the course calendar.
timeSection.noSections: No sections yet. Create one to get started!
timeSection.confirmDelete: Delete this section? Courses using it cannot be created.

tag.title: Tags
tag.name: Tag Name
tag.minRequiredHint: Min courses student must select from this tag
tag.maxAllowedHint: Max courses student can select (empty = unlimited)
tag.noTagsHint: No tags yet. Create one to get started!
tag.description: Tags are used to categorize courses and set enrollment constraints for students.

messages.confirmAction: Are you sure you want to proceed?

submission.title: Submissions
submission.deleteAllWarning: This will permanently delete all {count} submission(s) for this project. This action cannot be undone.

studentProjects.selectProject: Select a project to view courses and make your selections.
studentProjects.noProjects: You don't have any projects assigned yet.

home.tagline: Manage student course enrollments with ease

adminFeatures.title: For Administrators
adminFeatures.description: Powerful tools to manage your enrollment process
adminFeatures.feature1: Create and manage multiple enrollment projects
adminFeatures.feature2: Define time sections and course schedules
adminFeatures.feature3: Set enrollment rules with tags and capacity limits
adminFeatures.feature5: Track submissions and export enrollment data

studentFeatures.title: For Students
studentFeatures.feature1: Access enrollment via unique token or QR code
studentFeatures.feature2: View available courses in a visual calendar
studentFeatures.feature3: Select courses that fit your schedule

studentProjectDetail.submittedSuccess: Your enrollment has been submitted successfully!
studentProjectDetail.filterDescription: Click a tag to filter courses, or view all courses at once.
studentProjectDetail.scheduleDescription: Click on a course to view details and enroll.
studentProjectDetail.noTimeSections: No time sections configured for this project.
studentProjectDetail.confirmUnenroll: Are you sure you want to unenroll from this course?
studentProjectDetail.confirmSubmit: Are you sure you want to submit your enrollment selections? This action cannot be undone.
studentProjectDetail.alreadySubmitted: You have already submitted your selections for this project.
studentProjectDetail.meetRequirements: Please meet all requirements before submitting.
studentProjectDetail.submitSuccess: Your enrollment selections have been successfully submitted!
